title: Side effects of Black Festivals (with Brandon McEachern)
description:
This week, we sit with Brandon McEachern, creator of Broccoli City Festival, and talk all the reasons why safe spaces for black celebration are necessary.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
